page.topic: How to Submit a Feature Request
page.description: Feature requests can be submitted using the *[ui:Send an Enhancement Request]* menu option on the *[ui:Help]* menu in Alpha Anywhere.

discussion.p: We are constantly striving to improve Alpha Anywhere. You can submit feedback to us to suggest ways that the product can be improved using the *[ui:Send Enhancement Request]* menu item in the *[ui:Help]* menu.

section.important: The *[ui:Send Enhancement Request]* option should only be used to send feature requests. If you believe you found an issue with the product and need to report to Alpha Software, [Submit a Bug Report].

description.p: To guarantee a quick response to an enhancement request, remember to include the following information in the request:

item.name: Describe the request in as much detail as possible.
Include a screenshot if possible to indicate where the enhancement is needed.
Specify if the request is an enhancement to an existing feature or a new feature.

see.ref: How to Submit a Bug Report
